body: Summary : Hinata (the short haired girl) is tired lately. She told her friend Saki about how she starts having sex with her boyfriend Taisei (Saki's childhood friend) last month and now they're doing it everyday. Moreover, Taisei got great stamina and he keeps doing it even after she lost consciousness (the video she made is 4 hours long). Worried about her friend's health, Saki confront Taisei. He admits, he wants to handle Hina with more care, but his libido is just too high. Saki used to do prostitution (until last year) so he asks if she had any trick to help him keep it under control. Saki suggested she helps him relieve his lust. As result, Hina is happy because they don't always do sex but also more romantic dates now, and although feeling guilty, at least she did something for her best friend. Saki let her guard down and thus got caught by Hina. Hina is not troubled, because she likes Saki and thanks to Saki, she can enjoy her dates more. In the end, they went for threesome.
